title: Antidotes of Almack's: Emmeline
description: It is of little concern to Emmeline Pounceby that her childhood nemesis Nathaniel Markham has just returned to London with a title and a brand new fortune. After all, what does it signify to a twenty-five year old dyed-in-the-wool spinster? It is no concern of hers! Emmie is soon dismayed to find Nathan takes as much delight in teasing her as ever as she finds herself bound up in a false engagement taking the ton by storm! And his adult methods are far more tormenting than they ever were as a child…Almack’s A new regency romance series where the heroines are not dazzling beauties who take the ton by storm, but instead are possessed of a unique charm that appeals to their true love alone. Each one is a complete and independent story its own right with a happy ever after.This is a novella length story of 25,000 words
author: Hera James
